title: Clothing and customer service
text:
I bought over 700.00 of clothing shoes etc in one day.  When it arrived, several items were defective like one sleeve sewn shut cannot wear it.  One halter had darts all through one side and not the other so many sewing issues like that. I wrote 3 emails with no response cannot find any other customer service or refund area. I want a refund and impossible to get. I will never shop here again ever plus if you do get refund info they want all these pics downloaded and boxed and sent to China and I don‚Äôt have the time or printer to print a shipping receipt so I have to pay more money to send it back. It‚Äôs a total rip off I‚Äôd be fine if they‚Äôd answer me and refund me something fair  for all the stuff wrong out of over 700.00 I paid to buy everything just show you care somewhat.

Respectfully,
Julie street
